titles.title: What A Friend We Have In Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What A Friend we have in Jesus All our sins and griefs to bear What a privilege to carry Ev'rything to God in prayer O what peace we often forfeit O what needless pain we bear All because we do not carry Ev'rything to God in prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have we trials and temptations Is there trouble anywhere We should never be discouraged Take it to the Lord in prayer Can we find a friend so faithful Who will all our sorrows share Jesus knows our ev'ry weakness Take it to the Lord in prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Are we weak and heavy laden Cumbered with a load of care Precious Savior still our refuge Take it to the Lord in prayer Do thy friends despise forsake thee Take it to the Lord in prayer In His arms He'll take and shield thee Thou wilt find a solace there{/lang-eng}
